answers.answer: Probably not,  most people start with there feet having problems.  Diabetic problems start at the furthest extremity's feet then legs then hands.  you could also have a pinched nerve in your elbow or neck.those are pritty high fasting numbers.  what is your 1 hour after eating number?

Thank you for the mail. Kindly tell me :1. What should be the ideal fasting blood sugar number after having dinner with one Diabend M tab in the night ?2. After one hour eating means, after the breakfast with one Diabend M tablet or one hour after lunch or dinner ?? ( As I said, I take one Diabend-M in the morning and one in the night)

214 is VERY high (BG over 140 causes damage to your body)what did you eat for lunch?
1. Fasting blood sugar ideal range 80-902. After 1 hour 140 or less, after 2 hour 120 or lessAre you diagnose with diabetes? 214 is definite diabetes.

question: My left hand gets numbness or a sort of vibration and my right hand elbow gets pain.Medicines I take : 2 Diabend-M tabs (1 in the morning & 1 in the night) , Crestor 10mg (1 tab) , Ecospirin 75mg (1 tab)  and Neurobion Forte ( 1 tab)I take a half a spoon of a powder made from wild jeerakam, carom seeds and fenugreek everyday.  Also I take one grapefruit everyday and generally avoid rice, instead I take chappathi. My fasting blood sugar in the morning is between 110 and 140. Are my problems related to diabetes ?
title: Vibration/numbness and pain
